abstract.text: An error was found in the published version in the top plot in Fig. 1. The plot was erroneously replaced by a copy of the top plot of Fig. 4. The correct figure is shown below. The physics conclusions of the paper remain unchanged. Fig. 1. Distribution of the four-lepton invariant mass m + − + − . Points represent the data, while shaded histograms represent the SM prediction and background estimate. Hatched regions around the predicted yield represent combined statistical, systematic, theoretical, and integrated luminosity uncertainties.
